hero.title: Transforming Data Into Strategic Insights
hero.subtitle: Data Analytics & AI Solutions for Government and Business

about.title: Who We Are
about.description1: KPAnalytix is a premier data analytics and AI solutions company based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. We combine deep expertise in data science, economic policy, and international benchmarking to deliver transformative insights for government institutions and businesses.
about.description2: Our mission is to empower decision-makers with accurate, real-time data intelligence that drives strategic outcomes. We leverage cutting-edge AI technologies and proven methodologies to unlock the full potential of your data assets.

aboutPage.heroSubtitle: Building the future of data-driven decision making
aboutPage.missionText: To empower leaders and decision-makers with accurate, timely, and actionable data insights that drive strategic outcomes and support evidence-based policy making.
aboutPage.visionText: To become the leading data intelligence partner in the region, setting the benchmark for data-driven governance and business excellence.
aboutPage.historyText1: KPAnalytix was co-founded by Dr. Konrad Pesendorfer and Dr. Hend Aljobaily, bringing together decades of leadership experience in official statistics, economic policy, data analytics, and AI innovation.
aboutPage.historyText2: With proven track records leading national statistical offices, building AI solutions, developing forecasting models across multiple domains, and driving transformative data initiatives, our founders bring unparalleled expertise to every engagement.
aboutPage.historyText3: Our company combines deep experience of KSA's policy priorities and institutional setup with international expertise in economic policy making, cutting-edge AI capabilities, and advanced data analytics.
aboutPage.value1Text: We pursue the highest standards in everything we do, from data quality to client service.
aboutPage.value2Text: We continuously explore new technologies and methodologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
aboutPage.value3Text: We maintain the highest ethical standards and ensure complete transparency in our work.
aboutPage.value4Text: We focus on delivering measurable outcomes that make a real difference for our clients.

services.title: Comprehensive Data Solutions
services.subtitle: From predictive analytics to strategic policy advisory, we offer end-to-end services

predictiveAnalytics.title: Predictive Analytics
predictiveAnalytics.description: Advanced analytics using historical data, statistical techniques, and machine learning to forecast future outcomes, behaviors, and trends.

forecasting.title: Forecasting
forecasting.description: Predictions about future trends based on historical data, market conditions, and statistical models for strategic planning.

dashboards.title: Dashboards & Visualization
dashboards.description: Interactive dashboards converting complex data into clear visual representations for real-time insights and decision-making.

dataGovernance.title: Data Management & Governance
dataGovernance.description: Strategic frameworks of policies, processes, and standards to manage, protect, and ensure data quality throughout its lifecycle.

aiModels.title: AI Models
aiModels.description: Advanced machine learning and AI solutions that recognize patterns, make predictions, and generate insights from complex data.

statisticalConsulting.title: Statistical Consulting
statisticalConsulting.description: Expert advisory on modern statistical methods, study design, data analysis, and interpretation for evidence-based decisions.

kpiMeasurement.title: KPI Definition & Measurement
kpiMeasurement.description: Identifying, defining, and tracking quantifiable metrics that measure progress toward strategic objectives.

policyDesign.title: Economic Policy Design
policyDesign.description: Data-driven development, implementation, and evaluation of public policy interventions to achieve national objectives.

impactAssessment.title: Economic Impact Assessment
impactAssessment.description: Systematic analysis measuring economic effects of policies, projects, and investments on employment, GDP, and revenues.

internationalEconomics.title: International Economics
internationalEconomics.description: Analysis of global economic development and cross-border economic interactions including trade, investment, and capital flows.

bestPractices.title: International Best Practices
bestPractices.description: Evidence-based approaches that deliver superior results, serving as global standards for effectiveness and efficiency.

benchmarking.title: International Benchmarking
benchmarking.description: Systematic process of measuring and comparing performance against standardized metrics and global best practices.

servicesPage.heroSubtitle: Comprehensive solutions that transform how organizations leverage data
servicesPage.dataDescription: Transform your data into actionable insights with our comprehensive analytics services
servicesPage.policyDescription: Evidence-based policy design and evaluation for impactful decision-making
servicesPage.benchmarkDescription: Position your organization against global standards and best practices

experience.title: Proven Expertise Across Sectors
experience.subtitle: Delivering excellence in data analytics and policy advisory

experiencePage.heroSubtitle: Transformative impact across statistics, economics, and data science
experiencePage.highlight1Text: Led and transformed two National Statistical Offices - Statistics Austria (800+ FTEs) and General Authority for Statistics Saudi Arabia (1,100+ FTEs)
experiencePage.highlight2Text: Designed and led the first Register-based Census in Austria (2011) and the KSA 2022 Census Project
experiencePage.highlight3Text: Built comprehensive Economics Data & Statistics Functions, including forecasting models for population, macroeconomics, tourism, and finance
experiencePage.highlight4Text: Developed AI solutions, medical research analytics, and predictive modeling frameworks driving evidence-based decision-making at national scale

team.title: Meet Our Leadership
team.subtitle: World-class professionals with decades of experience in data science, AI, and statistics

founder.name: Dr. Konrad Pesendorfer
founder.bio: Globally accomplished executive and economist with over two decades of top-tier management experience in official statistics, economic policy, and data analytics.

cofounder.name: Dr. Hend Aljobaily
cofounder.bio: Distinguished Chief Data Scientist and innovation leader with expertise in AI-driven decision-making, advanced analytics, and data-driven transformation at national scale.

teamPage.heroSubtitle: Bringing decades of global experience to every engagement
teamPage.founderFullBio: Dr. Konrad Pesendorfer is a globally accomplished executive and economist, recognized for visionary leadership and transformative impact in official statistics, economic policy, and data analytics. With over two decades of top-tier management experience, Dr. Pesendorfer has driven innovation and modernization as Executive Director for Economics, Data & Statistics and previously as Chief Statistician and President at the General Authority for Statistics in Saudi Arabia.
teamPage.achievement1: Led Statistics Austria (800+ FTEs) and GASTAT Saudi Arabia (1,100+ FTEs)
teamPage.achievement2: Designed and led the KSA 2022 Census Project
teamPage.achievement3: Chairman of OECD Committee on Statistics and Statistical Policy
teamPage.achievement4: Economic Policy Advisor to the Austrian Prime Minister
teamPage.achievement5: Built forecasting models for Population, Macroeconomics, and Tourism
teamPage.achievement6: Member of the Austrian Fiscal Council
teamPage.educationText: Ph.D. in Economics from the University of Economics and Business Administration in Vienna
teamPage.experienceText: Fluent in English, French, and German. 30+ years in statistical leadership.
teamPage.residency: Based in Saudi Arabia since 2020, holder of premium residency visa
teamPage.cofounderFullBio: Dr. Hend Aljobaily is a distinguished Chief Data Scientist and innovation leader, playing a pivotal role in shaping the future of data, statistics, and AI-driven decision-making at national scale. She brings a rare blend of scientific rigor, strategic leadership, and execution excellence. In her dual leadership journey—as Chief Data Scientist and Deputy Executive Director of Data & Statistics—Dr. Aljobaily drives the design and adoption of advanced analytics, machine learning, and statistical frameworks that enable evidence-based policymaking and transformative insights across complex, data-intensive domains.
teamPage.cofounderAchievement1: Built forecasting models for various fields: population, tourism, and finance
teamPage.cofounderAchievement2: Developed AI solutions for complex business and government challenges
teamPage.cofounderAchievement4: Chief Data Scientist & Deputy Executive Director of Data & Statistics
teamPage.cofounderAchievement5: Director of Innovation Lab at General Authority For Statistics
teamPage.cofounderAchievement6: Strategy Analytics Section Head at Saudi Tourism Authority
teamPage.cofounderExpertiseText: AI, Machine Learning, Big Data, Predictive Modeling, Statistical Consulting

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: KPAnalytix ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or engage our services.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.text: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways, including:
collection.item1: Personal Data: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact information you provide
collection.item2: Business Information: Company name, job title, and business requirements
collection.item3: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, operating system, and usage patterns
collection.item4: Communication Data: Records of correspondence and feedback

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.text: We use the information we collect to:
use.item1: Provide, operate, and maintain our services
use.item2: Respond to your inquiries and fulfill your requests

security.title: Data Security
security.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.text: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and improve user experience. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or indicate when a cookie is being sent.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:
rights.item1: Right to access and receive a copy of your personal data
rights.item2: Right to rectify inaccurate personal data
rights.item3: Right to request deletion of your personal data
rights.item4: Right to withdraw consent at any time

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at office@kpanalytix.com

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing and using the KPAnalytix website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: Our Services
services.text: KPAnalytix provides data analytics, AI solutions, and consulting services. Our services include but are not limited to:

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.text: All content, features, and functionality on this website are owned by KPAnalytix and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written permission.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.text: We treat all client information with strict confidentiality. Any data, documents, or information shared with us in the course of our engagement will be kept confidential and will not be disclosed to third parties without your consent, except as required by law.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.text: To the fullest extent permitted by law, KPAnalytix shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of our services or website.

termination.title: Termination
termination.text: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our services at any time, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.text: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Riyadh.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.text: For any questions regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at office@kpanalytix.com
